description.narrative: Output 2.2 IDPs and vulnerable populations receive gender responsive and life-saving emergency WASH services, which contributes to Children In Urban Settings / Local Governance, Disaster Risk Reduction, Environmental Sustainability, Sanitation, Water, Water (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2022, children, adolescents and women, especially the most vulnerable, have improved access to equitable use of safe drinking water, sanitation, hygiene practices and healthy environments
